name: Demis Hassabis
title: CEO & Co-founder
archetypeDescription: Solving intelligence so he can finally have someone smart enough to talk to
flavor: Built an AI that beat Go champions, solved protein folding, and still somehow has to explain to his parents what he does.
bangerQuote: Won a Nobel Prize for AI and still gets asked 'but can it write my emails?' at dinner parties.
naturalRival: Anyone who says 'AGI is just hype'
roastBullets: Casually revolutionized biology between chess tournaments
Has a Nobel Prize and a Nature paper but LinkedIn still suggests he 'complete his profile'
The only person whose 'I was a child prodigy' story is somehow underselling it
Solved protein folding but still can't solve why Google keeps killing his favorite products
